member.name: M:AntigateSharp.Antigate.SendCapcha(System.Byte[],System.String@,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sending a captcha for the solution, waiting for reply
member.param: array of bytes received by performing Antigate.Http.GetRaw(url)
has the value of CapchaID if the request is accepted
0 = default (one word); 1 = CAPTCHA has two words
0 = default (case does not matter); 1 = case sensitive
0 = default; 1 = CAPTCHA consists only of numbers; 2 = Captcha has numbers
0 = default; 1 = math of digits displayed in a CAPTCHA
0 = default; > 0 = minimum length of text displayed in a CAPTCHA, the employee must enter; Must be 0 .. 20
0 = default (unlimited); > 0 = maximum length of the text displayed in a CAPTCHA, the employee must enter; Must be 0 .. 20
0 = default; 1 = show captcha employee with knowledge of the Russian language
The default value is exposed on rates page (here). This option allows you to control the maximum rate without having to edit the page rates.
Do not change to thank the author

member.name: M:AntigateSharp.Antigate.GetStatistic(System.String)
member.param: Date statistics in the format yyy-mm-dd
